src:
Klasemen Sementara Moto2 2019 usai Seri Sepang, Malaysia
03 Nov 2019, 13:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Usai finis kedua dalam Moto2 Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang, Minggu (3/11/2019), pebalap Estrella Galicia 0,0 Marc VDS, Alex Marquez kian kokoh di puncak klasemen pebalap dengan 262 poin.
Dengan hasil ini, Marquez pun sukses mengunci gelar dunia Moto2 2019, yakni gelar keduanya sejak Moto3 2014 lalu. Ia juga menjadi rider pertama dalam sejarah yang mampu meraih gelar dunia Moto3 dan Moto2.
Pebalap Spanyol ini diikuti oleh pebalap Red Bull KTM Ajo, Brad Binder, di peringkat kedua dengan 234 poin dan pebalap Dynavolt Intact GP, di peringkat ketiga dengan 230 poin.
Sementara itu peringkat keempat dan kelima masing-masing ditempati oleh pebalap Speed Up Racing, Jorge Navarro, dengan 210 poin dan pebalap Flexbox HP 40, Augusto Fernandez, dengan 197 poin.
Berikut klasemen sementara Moto2 2019 usai Seri Malaysia.
text:
Provisional Standings Moto2 2019 after the Sepang Series, Malaysia
Nov 03 2019, 13:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - After finishing second in Malaysian Moto2 at the Sepang Circuit on Sunday (3/11/2019), Estrella Galicia 0.0 Marc VDS rider, Alex Marquez is getting stronger at the top of the racer standings with 262 points.
With this result, Marquez successfully locked the Moto2 2019 world title, the second title since Moto3 2014. He also became the first rider in history to be able to win the Moto3 and Moto2 world titles.
The Spaniard was followed by Red Bull KTM Ajo racer, Brad Binder, ranked second with 234 points and Dynavolt Intact GP, ranked third with 230 points.
Meanwhile, the fourth and fifth place each was occupied by Speed Up Racing driver, Jorge Navarro, with 210 points and Flexbox HP 40 driver, Augusto Fernandez, with 197 points.
The following standings while Moto2 2019 after Malaysia Series.
